title.narrative: Rural Electrification Phase II Project of the Rural Electrification (APL) Program

description.narrative: a) To increase access to electricity of rural households in villages of Project provinces; and b) To further improve the financial performance of EdL.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA Schedule 2 Section II B.2 | Description :MEM to prepare Project Report to cover the period of one calendarsemester and submit to IDA no later than 45 days after the end ofthe period covered | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :FA Schedule 2 Section II B.2 | Description :MEM to prepare and furnish to IDA not later than 45 days after thenend of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Project. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section II A.1 | Description :EdL to prepare Project Report for Parts A.1 (a), A.2 (a) and A.5 (a)to cover the period of one calendar semester and submit to IDAno later than 45 days after the end of the period covered | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section II B.2 | Description :EdL to prepare and furnish to IDA not later than 45 days after thenend of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for Part A of the Project. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section II B.4 | Description :EdL to maintain net revenues of no less than 1.1 times (revised afterDec 2013 restructuring) annual projected debt service payments | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section II B.5(a) | Description :Funds from internal sources of EdL equivalent to not less than 15%of the an average of its capital exp (DROPPED after Dec 2013 restructuring) incurred or expected to beincurred for that FY, theprevious FY and following FY | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section II B.6 | Description :EdL shall not incur any debt, if after the incurrence of such debt,the ratio of debt to equity shall be greater than 60 to 40. | Frequency :Yearly
